column8: 2015 at hancock regional hospital hospice unit surrounded by her family. she was born on september 22
column9: 1937 in indianapolis as the daughter of maurice and ruth (harrison) holmes. she graduated from greenfield high school in 1955. jeanne married jerry d. frazier on january 1
column10: 1956 in mohawk. she worked for fort benjamin harrison as the secretary to the commanding general for 37 years before retiring in 1993. jeanne loved spending time with her family and grandchildren. she also enjoyed playing bingo and going to casinos with her friends and family
column11: and going to vegas with her sisters. jeanne is survived by her children
column14: and jodi martin of indianapolis; sisters
column16: fl and joan payne of charlottesville
column27: and kaylee pierce; and one great-great-grandson
column28: kyson mc. donald; and several nieces and nephews. she was preceded in death by her husband
